overview: This set from 20th Century Fox collects a half-dozen movies that are based on stage musicals written by Rodgers & Hammerstein. The titles in this package include the love story Carousel; the Academy Award-winning The King and I; their first collaboration, Oklahoma!; the beloved Julie Andrews vehicle The Sound of Music; the Academy Award-winning South Pacific; and the charming romantic comedy State Fair. Fans of movie musicals, as well as Rodgers & Hammerstein enthusiasts, will surely savor this box set.
title: The Rodgers & Hammerstein Collection (5)
